Description: Manage a Service Level Objective in Dynatrace.
Schema:
{"typeName":"Dynatrace::Environment::ServiceLevelObjective","description":"Manage a Service Level Objective in Dynatrace.","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-dynatrace-resource-providers.git","documentationUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-dynatrace-resource-providers","definitions":{"DynatraceAccess":{"type":"object","properties":{"Token":{"description":"Personal Access Token","type":"string"},"Endpoint":{"description":"Endpoint URL to access Dynatrace API","type":"string"}},"required":["Token","Endpoint"],"additionalProperties":false},"ErrorBudgetBurnRate":{"description":"Error budget burn rate configuration of a service-level objective (SLO).","type":"object","properties":{"FastBurnThreshold":{"description":"The threshold between a slow and a fast burn rate.","type":"number"},"BurnRateVisualizationEnabled":{"description":"The error budget burn rate visualization is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

In case of false, no calculated values will be present here.","type":"boolean"}},"required":["FastBurnThreshold","BurnRateVisualizationEnabled"],"additionalProperties":false}},"typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"DynatraceAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DynatraceAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["DynatraceAccess"]},"properties":{"Name":{"description":"The name of the SLO.","type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":200},"Description":{"description":"The description of the SLO.","type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":250},"MetricName":{"description":"The name for a metric expression.","type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z][a-z0-9\_]*$"},"MetricExpression":{"description":"The percentage-based metric expression for the calculation of the SLO.","type":"string"},"EvaluationType":{"description":"The evaluation type of the SLO.","type":"string","enum":["AGGREGATE"]},"Filter":{"description":"The entity filter for the SLO evaluation. Use the syntax of entity selector (https://dt-url.net/entityselector).","type":"string"},"Target":{"description":"The target value of the SLO.","type":"number","minimum":0,"maximum":100},"Warning":{"description":"The warning value of the SLO.

At warning state the SLO is still fulfilled but is getting close to failure.","type":"number","minimum":0,"maximum":100},"ErrorBudgetBurnRate":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ErrorBudgetBurnRate"},"Timeframe":{"description":"The timeframe for the SLO evaluation. Use the syntax of the global timeframe selector.","type":"string"},"Id":{"description":"Id of the SLO.","type":"string"},"Enabled":{"description":"The SLO is enabled (true) or disabled (false).","type":"boolean"},"BurnRateMetricKey":{"description":"The error budget burn rate key for a metric expression.","type":"string"},"RelatedOpenProblems":{"description":"Number of OPEN problems related to the SLO.

Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.","type":"integer"},"RelatedTotalProblems":{"description":"Total number of problems related to the SLO.

Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.","type":"integer"},"HasAccess":{"description":"The SLO is accessible through the settings if hasAccess is true.","type":"boolean"},"EvaluatedPercentage":{"description":"The calculated value of the SLO. Has the value of the evaluated SLO or the value of -1:

    If there is an error with the SLO calculation; in that case check the value of the error property.
    If the evaluate parameter has not been set to true; in that case the error property will contain no error.","type":"number"},"ErrorBudget":{"description":"The error budget of the calculated SLO.

The error budget is the difference between the calculated and target values. A positive number means all is good; a negative number means trouble.","type":"number"},"MetricKey":{"description":"The key for a metric expression. Once created, metric keys can't be changed.","type":"string"},"Status":{"description":"The status of the calculated SLO.","type":"string","enum":["FAILURE","SUCCESS","WARNING"]},"Error":{"description":"The error of the SLO calculation.

If the value differs from NONE there's something wrong with the SLO calculation.","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false,"tagging":{"taggable":false},"required":["Name","EvaluationType","Timeframe"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/Id","/properties/Enabled","/properties/BurnRateMetricKey","/properties/RelatedOpenProblems","/properties/RelatedTotalProblems","/properties/EvaluatedPercentage","/properties/ErrorBudget","/properties/MetricKey","/properties/Status","/properties/Error"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/Id"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"update":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]},"list":{"permissions":[]}}}
